cmput301.f13t01.model

Class ChoiceMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.model.ChoiceMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ChoiceMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains all methods associated with selecting adding, editing or removing the choice linkages for a given story.
    Author:
    Reginald Miller, October 2013
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ChoiceMap

        public ChoiceMap()

    • Method Detail

      • addChoice

        public void addChoice(java.lang.Integer fragmentId,
             Choice choice)
        This is called whenever a previously-unlinked choice selects a new destination.
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of fragment where choice is located
        choice - Choice object to add to the ChoiceMap

      • deleteChoice

        public boolean deleteChoice(java.lang.Integer fragmentId,
                   int index)
        Removes a choice from the ChoiceMap when author unlinks a choice
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of fragment where choice is located
        index - Index of the choice to remove
        Returns:
        Returns true if choice existed, otherwise returns false

      • updateChoice

        public boolean updateChoice(java.lang.Integer fragmentId,
                   int index,
                   Choice choice)
        Switches the destination of an already-linked choice to a different destination fragment.
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of fragment where choice is located
        index - Index of choice to change
        choice - New choice to put in there
        Returns:
        Returns true if choice already existed, false otherwise

      • cleanFragmentReferences

        public void cleanFragmentReferences(java.lang.Integer fragmentId)
        Want this to be called when a fragment is deleted. If it doesn't exist, then there's nothing to remove. Also removes all choices currently linked to it.
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of fragment to remove from all choices

      • getChoices

        public java.util.ArrayList<Choice> getChoices(java.lang.Integer fragmentId)
        Returns an ArrayList of map entries for all possible choices for the fragment. Entries are sorted by fragment ID.
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of fragment to fetch the choices for
        Returns:
        Assorted ArrayList of Integer, String pairs associated with fragment ID and choice text
